title: Typo Puns Abound
content:
Just this one time (and out of boredom), I chose to abandon my usually serious nature. Here’s one to start you off. First the image, then a link to its context:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142104im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/David%20Sanborn%20Ligature_4755.JPG)

[Harrison Gold Plated Ligature from David Sanborn](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142104/http:/cgi.ebay.com/Harrison-Gold-Plated-Ligature-from-David-Sanborn_W0QQitemZ320018368714QQcmdZViewItem#ebayphotohosting) on eBay.

Can anybody top that?

 [‹ Design in Ontario](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27809 "Go to previous forum topic") [Clearview can cut codger crashes! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27911 "Go to next forum topic")
author: brampitoyo

comments.content:
<cite>Can anybody top that?</cite>

check 50% of Chris Lozos’ comments :)

r.k

wait, [“Chris abhors puns.”](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142104/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chris%20Lozos)
